channel.title: Privacy Please on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy Please on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: How Microschools Became the Latest Tech Mogul Obsession
item.description: Between homeschool provisions in the One Big Beautiful Bill and Trump’s attempts to gut the Department of Education, teaching kids looks different now. Silicon Valley’s answer? Microschools.
